metadata.title: 5378-2 -- XZ Utils vulnerability
metadata.description: Cleemy Desu Wayo discovered that XZ Utils incorrectly handled certain filenames. If a user or automated system were tricked into performing xzgrep operations with specially crafted filenames, a remote attacker could overwrite arbitrary files.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo ua fix USN-5378-2` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  liblzma5 - 5.2.5-2ubuntu0.1 liblzma-doc - 5.2.5-2ubuntu0.1 liblzma-dev - 5.2.5-2ubuntu0.1 xz-utils - 5.2.5-2ubuntu0.1 xzdec - 5.2.5-2ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
